body:
On this edition of "guess the.." you guys have to be guessing certain video games, just by looking at certain people's hints about the video game they are trying to make you guess. So here is the first game! Put down three hints, but try not to give a ton of info away!

1. this game is probably one of the most popular capture the flag games on steam
2. It has two teams (blu, and red)
3. One of the classes is called a heavy

What game is this???

title: [Forum Game] Guess the Video Game!

replies.body: Now say what you want people to guess!
replies.body_tagged: Now say what you want people to guess!

replies.body:

2. Singleplayer
3. The Cake is a lie
